page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: OUR SURVEY AREA CONTAINS PARTS OF THE SMALL VILLAGES OF WIX AND WRABNESS IN NORTH EAST ESSEX.THE REMAINDER OF THE AREA IS FARM LAND MAINLY UNDER CULTIVATION FOR CEREAL AND VEGETABLE CROPS WITH A LITTLE GRASSLAND. THE LAND BELONGS TO ABOUT TWENTY FARMERS. SOME RENT THEIR LAND FROM THE COUNTY COUNCIL,OTHERS HAVE OWNED THEIR LAND FOR GENERATIONS AND SOME IS OWNED BY LARGE COMPANIES BASED ELSEWHERE IN ESSEX.THE MAIN ROAD FROM COLCHESTER TO HARWICH CARRIES HEAVY GOODS TRAFFIC AND TOURIST TRAFFIC THROUGH OUR AREA. IN THE EARLY 1970'S A NEW BY-PASS WAS CONSTRUCTED TO EASE CONGESTION IN WIX. EMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA IS BASED MAINLY IN AGRICULTURE, THE PORT OF HARWICH AND IN LOCAL SERVICE INDUSTRIES IN NEARBY TOWNS SUCH AS IPSWICH,COLCHESTER AND CLACTON-ON-SEA.
